HowToPlay.title: How to Play
HowToPlay.description: Guess the hidden 5-letter word in 6 tries. Each guess must be a valid word. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
HowToPlay.correct: Green: Letter is correct and in the correct position.
HowToPlay.present: Yellow: Letter is in the word but in the wrong position.
HowToPlay.absent: Gray: Letter is not in the word at all.
HowToPlay.useKeyboard: Use your keyboard or click the virtual keys to input guesses. Press <kbd>Enter</kbd> to submit.
HowToPlay.invalidWord: You cannot submit words that are not in the dictionary.
